course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Structural Steel Design
course.description: Limit state design of steel structures, stability analysis of thin-walled members, design of tension members, columns, beams, plate girders, beam-columns, structural connections, plastic analysis and design.

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 做structure一定要讀嘅course
reviews.comment_content:
繼year 3嘅CIVL3320之後
去到year 4又有design course可以學practical嘅野
如果自問CIVL3320個底夠好
就一定唔可以錯過呢個course
強烈建議讀 無理由civil畢業會唔識steel

----------Midterm and Final Exam start from here----------
1. Introduction (1.5 weeks)
Aims of structural design; design of structural systems vs structural members; Limit state design concepts; steel as structural material; standard steel sections and section classifications

2. Tension members (1 week)
Behaviour of tension members - gross yielding vs net section fracture; tensile strength; effects of eccentricity of end connections.

3. Compression members (2.5 weeks)
Column behaviour and modes of failure; overall flexural buckling analysis of slender columns; Perry column formula and multiple column curves; Influence of end conditions

4. Beam members (2.5 weeks)
Beam behaviour and modes of failure; beams with lateral restraints; moment and shear capacity of beams; web buckling and web bearing; beams without lateral restraints; lateral torsional buckling (LTB) analysis; general and simplified design procedures
----------- Midterm Exam up to here-----------
5. Plate girders (2 weeks)
Behaviour of a plate girder; web shear buckling, post-buckling tension field action; web stiffener and end post design

6. Beam-Column members (2.5 weeks)
Beam-column behaviour; combined tension and moment; combined compression and moment; buckling analysis with second-order effects; concept of effective length and equivalent moment; interaction formulae

7. Structural connections (1 week)
Introduction of welded connections and bolted connections; design strength of welds; analysis and design of welded connections; design strength of bolts; analysis and design of bolted connections.
---------- Final Exam up to here----------
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. CHAN教得好好
已經退咗休但都返黎教Ch.1-4
佢係香港人 又有份整HK steel code
而且concept同code application並重
上佢堂真係會學到野
英文都講得好好
堂上間唔中會問啲難嘅問題
逼學生思考
亦樂意解答問題

Prof. PAN係新人
負責教Ch.5-7
雖然係大陸人 但英文都唔差
佢用自己整嘅powerpoint教書
不過就教得比較悶

Tutorial方面
2位professor都會親自操刀
引導學生做assignment
所以係拆題嘅過程入面會學到野
值得一去
reviews.comment_grading:
Assignment x3 (15%)
Assignment 1: 98/100
Assignment 2: 100/100
Assignment 3: 98/100

Pop Quizzes x3 (5%)
Quiz 1: 10/10
Quiz 2: 4/10
Quiz 3: 4/10

Midterm Exam (30%)
可以帶一版A4 cheatsheet + calculator
考試會比HK steel code
同埋standard steel section table
Mean: 54.9 (LQ: 41.5, Median: 53, UQ: 69.5, Highest: 89, SD: 16.7)
My Score: 82/100

Final Exam (50%)
考法同midterm一樣
My Score: 87/100 (要email問prof.)

Overall: 85.9%
Grade: A+
Professor話會比大約30% A range 都算多
reviews.comment_workload:
經歷過CIVL3320嘅洗禮
其實個workload還好
3次assignment難度稍高
因為係比較複雜既case
要trial and error
不過有tutorial幫手 就比較好搞

Quiz方面
係突擊出嘅
所以最好唔好走堂/遲到
唔洗特登溫 只係簡單MC題

Exam方面
建議做吓past paper
要熟個design flow
都要溫吓concept,佔10-20%分數
要花時間整cheatsheet
建議list哂詳細嘅design procedure
同埋table/formula嘅code page number
Exam個陣就可以慳時間
否則會唔夠時間做題

Homework assignments (3 sets) 15%
Pop quizzes 5%
Mid-term exam 30%
Final exam 50%

Personal Result
Assignments: Almost full mark
Pop quizzes: get less than 50%
Midterm: Mean score
Final: The result was unknown but I screwed up my final

reviews.comment_workload:
Assignments:
The first assignment was announced on week 2, each assignment should have 2 weeks for you to work on. Should not be a big problem if you have sources.

Exam:
- Both conceptual & calculation type questions will be asked, please be familiar with the CoP (I was unfamiliar with the code and spent around 1hr on flipping over the CoP in the final, really a waste of time)

- Only 1 page of handwritten A4 sized cheatsheet was allowed to be brought in the midterm, 2 pages of handwritten A4 sized cheatsheet was allowed in final exam.

- Code of Practice & standard steel section are always provided, so don't bother copying something that's already in the CoP

reviews.author: Tiger
reviews.title: Generally nice teacher
reviews.comment_content:
I think the syllabus of the course has been detailedly listed by other students so I may not put it here.

Generally, the properties and behaviors of steel, how to design steel columns, beams, (flexural buckling and torsional bucking, overall and local buckling), plate girder, beam-columns and briefly introduce steel connectors.
reviews.comment_teaching: Very nice teaching and Professor is famous for its excellence. But taking bonus points was kind of not so accepted by me and this made not feel so well in the class. Or you may think this is his teaching style. 9 o clock class needs persistence.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is not so bad, as I did not do so well in the mid-term but study more thoroughly in the final exam. It takes some time and patience as if you did it wrong in one step, say wrong calculation of cross-sectional area, the steps followed will be all wrong.
reviews.comment_workload: Workload is not light, but design course really needs a lot of practice so just attend all the tutorials and get practices well.
